name: Laser Rain
description:
Laser Rain

SEIZURE WARNING: This game has some mild flickering light effects that could cause problems to people who get seizures from flashing lights.

Story: There's a laser rainstorm outside! Do your best to dodge the lasers that come down. The game ends when you are struck by one.

Controls:

Left and Right keys: Move left and right, respectively.

Made in 512 characters with #Pico8 for #TweetTweetJam 3
